name: Hallow's Eve (dmrichey)
description:
The townsfolk are angry! A werewolf has been seen prowling around a small town village, and the villagers will stop at nothing to make sure that he is killed!

Play as the werewolf who is trying his best to escape the traps of the villagers to get back to his cave in the mountains. 

Collect colorful moons to unlock new parts of the level in order to eventually escape. Be Careful!! The villager's rage has reached all new heights. It may even appear to glow a bright red.
